df-mzpcl
blocks.content: Define the polynomially closed function rings over an arbitrary index set ` v ` . The set ` ( mzPolyCld `` v ) ` contains all sets of functions from ` ( ZZ ^m v ) ` to ` ZZ ` which include all constants and projections and are closed under addition and multiplication. This is a "temporary" set used to define the polynomial function ring itself ` ( mzPoly `` v ) ` ; see ~ df-mzp . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mzpcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  |- wceq(cmzpcl, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cpw(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wral(s2, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), cv(s1))), wral(s3, cv(s0), wcel(cmpt(s4, co(cz, cmap, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s4), cv(s3))), cv(s1)))), wral(s5, cv(s1), wral(s6, cv(s1), wa(wcel(co(cv(s5), cof(caddc), cv(s6)), cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(s5), cof(cmul), cv(s6)), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-mzp
blocks.content: Polynomials over ` ZZ ` with an arbitrary index set, that is, the smallest ring of functions containing all constant functions and all projections. This is almost the most general reasonable definition; to reach full generality, we would need to be able to replace ZZ with an arbitrary (semi)ring (and a coordinate subring), but rings have not been defined yet. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpclval
blocks.content: Substitution lemma for ` mzPolyCld ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: elmzpcl
blocks.content: Double substitution lemma for ` mzPolyCld ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmzpcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cmzpcl, c0)), wa(wss(c1, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), c1))), wral(s3, c1, wral(s4, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), c1), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), c1))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cmzpcl, c0)), wa(wss(c1, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), c1))), wral(s3, c1, wral(s4, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), c1), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), c1)))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cfv(cmzpcl, c0)), wa(wss(c1, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), c1))), wral(s3, c1, wral(s4, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), c1), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), c1)))))), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cpw(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))), wral(s3, cv(hs0), wral(s4, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), cv(hs0)))))))))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(cmzpcl, c0), crab(hs0, cpw(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))), wral(s3, cv(hs0), wral(s4, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  mzpclval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, c0)
  bitri(wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cpw(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)))), wral(s3, cv(hs0), wral(s4, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), cv(hs0)))))))), wa(wss(c1, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), c1))), wral(s3, c1, wral(s4, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), c1), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), c1)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cpw(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0)))), wa(wa(wral(s0, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1))), c1))), wral(s3, c1, wral(s4, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(caddc), cv(s4)), c1), wcel(co(cv(s3), cof(cmul), cv(s4)), c1)))))))

blocks.name: mzpclall
blocks.content: The set of all functions with the signature of a polynomial is a polynomially closed set. This is a lemma to show that the intersection in ~ df-mzp is well-defined. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpclall(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0)), cfv(cmzpcl, c0)))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wcel(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0)), cfv(cmzpcl, c0)), wcel(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0))), cfv(cmzpcl, cv(hs0))))
  eleq12d(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0))), cfv(cmzpcl, cv(hs0)), co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c0)), cfv(cmzpcl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), co(cz, cmap, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cz, cmap)

blocks.name: mzpcl1
blocks.content: Defining property 1 of a polynomially closed function set ` P ` : it contains all constant functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzpcl, c1)), wcel(c2, cz))

  rspcva(hs0, c2, cz, wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c1), csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wcel(cxp(co(cz, cmap, c1), csn(c2)), c0))

thm mzpcl34(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzpcl, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wa(wcel(co(c2, cof(caddc), c3), c0), wcel(co(c2, cof(cmul), c3), c0)))

blocks.name: dmmzp
blocks.content: ` mzPoly ` is defined for all index sets which are sets. This is used with ~ elfvdm to eliminate sethood antecedents. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpincl
blocks.content: Polynomial closedness is a universal first-order property and passes to intersections. This is where the closure properties of the polynomial ring itself are proved. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpconst
blocks.content: Constant functions are polynomial. See also ~ mzpconstmpt . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpf
blocks.content: A polynomial function is a function from the coordinate space to the integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wf(c0, co(cz, cmap, c1), cz))
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wf(c0, co(cz, cmap, c1), cz), wcel(c0, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1))))
  anidms(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wcel(c0, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1))))
  sselda(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1), co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wss(cfv(cmzp, c1), co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cmzp, c1)
  eqsstrd(cfv(cmzp, c1), co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), cint(cfv(cmzpcl, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  mzpval(c1)
  syl(wcel(c1, universe), wss(cint(cfv(cmzpcl, c1)), co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1))), wcel(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), cfv(cmzpcl, c1)))
  mzpclall(c1)
  intss1(co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), cfv(cmzpcl, c1))
  elmap(c0, cz, co(cz, cmap, c1))
  zex()
  ovex(cz, cmap, c1)
}

thm mzpf(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1)‚Üí(c0 :(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Üí ‚Ñ§))

  syl(c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1), (mzPoly ` c1)‚äÜ(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶](‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)

  mzpval(c1)

blocks.name: mzpproj
blocks.content: A projection function is polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpadd
blocks.content: The pointwise sum of two polynomial functions is a polynomial function. See also ~ mzpaddmpt . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpmul
blocks.content: The pointwise product of two polynomial functions is a polynomial function. See also ~ mzpmulmpt . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpconstmpt
blocks.content: A constant function expressed in maps-to notation is polynomial. This theorem and the several that follow ( ~ mzpaddmpt , ~ mzpmulmpt , ~ mzpnegmpt , ~ mzpsubmpt , ~ mzpexpmpt ) can be used to build proofs that functions which are "manifestly polynomial", in the sense of being a maps-to containing constants, projections, and simple arithmetic operations, are actually polynomial functions. There is no mzpprojmpt because ~ mzpproj is already expressed using maps-to notation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mzpaddmpt
blocks.content: Sum of polynomial functions is polynomial. Maps-to version of ~ mzpadd . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpaddmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, caddc, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, caddc, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0), co(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wceq(co(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2)), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, caddc, c2))), wfn(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0)), wfn(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0)))
  ffnd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  mzpf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), c0)
  ffnd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  mzpf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), c0)

blocks.name: mzpmulmpt
blocks.content: Product of polynomial functions is polynomial. Maps-to version of ~ mzpmulmpt . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpmulmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmul, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmul, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0), co(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cof(cmul), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wceq(co(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cof(cmul), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2)), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmul, c2))), wfn(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0)), wfn(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0)))
  ffnd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  mzpf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), c0)
  ffnd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  mzpf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), c0)
  mp3an1(wfn(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0)), wfn(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0)), wceq(co(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cof(cmul), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2)), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmul, c2))), wcel(co(cz, cmap, c0), universe))
  ovex(cz, cmap, c0)
  ofmpteq(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), universe, c1, c2, cmul)
  mzpmul(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), c0, cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, cz, cmap, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mzpsubmpt
blocks.content: The difference of two polynomial functions is polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpsubmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmin, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2))), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))))
  mpteq2da(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, cmin, c2), co(c1, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2)), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  nfel1(s0, cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0))
  nfmpt1(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1)
  nfel1(s0, cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))
  nfmpt1(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2)
  eqtr2d(co(c1, cmin, c2), co(c1, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2)), co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2), cneg(c2), wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))
  mulm1d(c2, wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))
  zcnd(c1, wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))
  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))), wcel(c1, cz), wf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0)), wf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz))
  mzpf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), c0)
  mptfcl(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1, cz)
  zcnd(c2, wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))
  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))), wcel(c2, cz), wf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0)), wf(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), co(cz, cmap, c0), cz))

  mptfcl(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2, cz)
  sylan2(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(c1, caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2))), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  mpancom(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2)), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  sylancl(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cneg(nat1), cz))
  elfvex(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c2), cmzp, c0)
  neg1z()
  mzpconstmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1))
  mzpmulmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1), c2)
  mzpaddmpt(s0, c0, c1, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmzp, c0)
  diff.cmzp.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cz, cmap, c0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mzpnegmpt
blocks.content: Negation of a polynomial function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpnegmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cneg(c1)), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cneg(c1)), cfv(cmzp, c0), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(nat0, cmin, c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  mpteq2i(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cneg(c1), co(nat0, cmin, c1))
  df-neg(c1)
  mpancom(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), co(nat0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), nat0), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  sylancl(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), nat0), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(nat0, cz))
  elfvex(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), c1), cmzp, c0)
  0z()
  mzpconstmpt(s0, c0, nat0)
  mzpsubmpt(s0, c0, nat0, c1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c0)‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(mzPoly ` c0)‚Üí(s0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c0)‚Ü¶ -u(c1))‚àà(mzPoly ` c0))

blocks.name: mzpindd
blocks.content: "Structural" induction to prove properties of all polynomial functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpindd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5, wff w6, wff w7, wff w8) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1))), w1)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cz)), w2)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w3)
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c1), cz), w4), wa(wf(cv(s1), co(cz, cmap, c1), cz), w5)), w6)
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c1), cz), w4), wa(wf(cv(s1), co(cz, cmap, c1), cz), w5)), w7)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cxp(co(cz, cmap, c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wb(w8, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cmpt(s1, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wb(w8, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wb(w8, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w8, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cof(caddc), cv(s1))), wb(w8, w6))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cof(cmul), cv(s1))), wb(w8, w7))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), c0), wb(w8, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w8)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w8)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w4)
  -| diffsw(s2, w5)
  -| diffsw(s2, w6)
  -| diffsw(s2, w7)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1))), w1), diffsw(s2, w0))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1))), w1, wcel(c0, crab(s2, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), w8)))
  mpdan(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1))), wcel(c0, crab(s2, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), w8)), wcel(c1, universe))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cmzp, c1)
  an32s(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, crab(s2, co(cz, cmap, co(cz, cmap, c1)), w8)))

blocks.name: mzpmfp
blocks.content: Relationship between multivariate Z-polynomials and general multivariate polynomial functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpmfp(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cmzp, c0), crn(co(c0, cevl, zring)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmzp, c0), crn(co(c0, cevl, zring))), wcel(c0, universe))

blocks.name: mzpsubst
blocks.content: Substituting polynomials for the variables of a polynomial results in a polynomial. ` G ` is expected to depend on ` y ` and provide the polynomials which are being substituted. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mzprename
blocks.content: Simplified version of ~ mzpsubst to simply relabel variables in a polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzprename(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cfv(cmzp, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c1, ccom(cv(s0), c3))), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c1, ccom(cv(s0), c3))), cfv(cmzp, c0), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(cmpt(hs1, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0))))), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cfv(cmzp, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c0)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cfv(cmzp, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c0), wceq(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c1, ccom(cv(s0), c3))), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(cmpt(hs1, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)))))))
  mpteq2dva(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c1, ccom(cv(s0), c3)), cfv(c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(cmpt(hs1, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wf(c3, c2, c0)))
  fveq2d(c1, ccom(cv(s0), c3), cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(cmpt(hs1, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(cv(hs1), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wf(c3, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cz, cmap, c0))))

blocks.name: mzpresrename
blocks.content: A polynomial is a polynomial over all larger index sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpresrename(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1))), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c2, cres(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cmzp, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c2, cres(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cmzp, c0), cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c2, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c1)))), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1))))
  mpteq2i(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c2, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c1))), cfv(c2, cres(cv(s0), c1)))
  fveq2i(c2, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c1)), cres(cv(s0), c1))
  coires1(cv(s0), c1)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1))), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(cz, cmap, c0), cfv(c2, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c1)))), cfv(cmzp, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c0))
  mpan(wss(c1, c0), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c0), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  ax-mp(wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1of(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1)
  fss(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1, c0)
  mzprename(s0, c0, c2, c1, cres(cid, c1))
  diff.cres.s(s0, cid, c1)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mzpcompact2
blocks.content: Polynomials are finitary objects and can only reference a finite number of variables, even if the index set is infinite. Thus, every polynomial can be expressed as a (uniquely minimal, although we do not prove that) polynomial on a finite number of variables, which is then extended by adding an arbitrary set of ignored variables. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mzpcompact2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cmzp, c1)
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))), wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cmzp, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmzp, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cmzp)
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, cfn, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  eqeq2d(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpteq1d(s2, co(cz, cmap, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0))), co(cz, cmap, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cz, cmap)
  mzpcompact2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmzp, c1)), wrex(s0, cfn, wrex(s1, cfv(cmzp, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, co(cz, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)

thm mzpcompact2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0)))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0)))))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, cmzp, c1)
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, universe, (c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))))))), (c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` hs0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]hs0)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))))))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` hs0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]hs0)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0)))))), c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0)))))))
  eleq2d(c0, (mzPoly ` hs0), (mzPoly ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cmzp)
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, cfn, (mzPoly ` s0), hs0 = c1, (s0 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]hs0)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0)))), (s0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, s0 ‚äÜ hs0, c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]hs0)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))), s0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))))
  sseq2(hs0, c1, s0)
  eqeq2d(c0, (s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]hs0)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))), (s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))), hs0 = c1)
  mpteq1d(s2, (‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]hs0), (s1 `(s2 |` s0)), (‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, cz, cmap)
  mzpcompact2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(mzPoly ` c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(mzPoly ` s0),(s0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 =(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(s1 `(s2 |` s0))))))))
